channel.title: assignment on van de Riet Fundamentals of Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in assignment on van de Riet Fundamentals of Analytics

item.title: Assignment A01: GGPLOT2
item.description: Within this assignment: Categorical data visualization Numerical data visualization Discussion Categorical Data Visualization Species Petal Widths Species Petal Lengths Numerical Data Visualization Sepal Length vs Width ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species)) + geom_point() + theme_light() + ggtitle("Comparing Sepal Lengths and Widths") + xlab("Sepal Length") + ylab("Sepal Width") Petal Length vs Sepal Lengths ggplot(iris, aes(Petal.Length, Sepal.Length, color = Species)) + geom_point() + theme_light() + ggtitle("Comparing Petal and Sepal Lengths") + xlab("Petal Length") + ylab("Sepal Length") Discussion Within this assignment, I had difficulties finding a dataset that provided data that I felt would allow me to adequately meet the assignment requirements.
